name: MagnetGold
description: MagnetGold is a new revolution in the crypto world. MagnetGold is created by Longreen Corporation Limited. MTG Have Large and Strong Experienced Management, Technical and Marketing Team. We have built our MagnetGold (MTG) Token because we strongly believe that it will represent the heart of the ecosystem for a new category of investors, companies seeking to grow their capital, investment funds, venture capital, families, offices, traders and so on. MagnetGold is being created to make this world more developed and prosper by using Blockchain Technology. In future MTG is going to support many other concepts for more prosperity of the world.
